targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  inserted_at AS "time",
  efficiency
FROM cars
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(inserted_at)
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
	sum(cost)
FROM
	charging_processes
WHERE
	$__timeFilter(end_date)
	AND car_id = $car_id;

SELECT convert_km((max(odometer) - min(odometer))::numeric, '$length_unit') as "distance_$length_unit"
FROM positions
WHERE car_id = $car_id AND $__timeFilter(date)
ORDER BY 1;

SELECT
	count(*)
FROM
	charging_processes
WHERE
	$__timeFilter(end_date)
	AND charge_energy_added > 0.01
	AND car_id = $car_id;

SELECT
	sum(greatest(charge_energy_added,charge_energy_used))
FROM
	charging_processes
WHERE
	$__timeFilter(end_date)
	AND car_id = $car_id AND charge_energy_added > 0.01

SELECT
	sum(greatest(charge_energy_added,charge_energy_used))
FROM
	charging_processes
WHERE
	$__timeFilter(end_date)
	AND car_id = $car_id AND charge_energy_added > 0.01
	AND cost = 0;

WITH data AS (
  SELECT
		cp.id,
		cp.charge_energy_added,
		CASE WHEN NULLIF(mode() within group (order by charger_phases),0) is null THEN 'DC'
				 ELSE 'AC'
		END AS current,
		cp.charge_energy_used
	FROM charging_processes cp
  RIGHT JOIN charges ON cp.id = charges.charging_process_id
  WHERE
	  cp.car_id = $car_id
	  AND cp.charge_energy_added > 0.01
	  AND $__timeFilter(start_date)
  GROUP BY 1,2
)
SELECT
	now() AS time,
	sum(greatest(charge_energy_added, charge_energy_used)) AS value,
	current AS metric
FROM data
GROUP BY 3
ORDER BY metric DESC;

SELECT (
  SELECT sum(cost)
  FROM charging_processes
  WHERE $__timeFilter(end_date) AND car_id = $car_id
) / (
	SELECT convert_km((max(odometer) - min(odometer))::numeric, '$length_unit')
	FROM positions
	WHERE $__timeFilter(date) AND car_id = $car_id
) * 100

SELECT (
  SELECT sum(cost)
  FROM charging_processes
  WHERE $__timeFilter(end_date) AND car_id = $car_id
) / (
  SELECT sum(greatest(charge_energy_added, charge_energy_used))
  FROM charging_processes
  WHERE $__timeFilter(end_date) AND car_id = $car_id
)

WITH data AS (
	SELECT c.charging_process_id 
	FROM charges c
	LEFT JOIN charging_processes cp ON cp.id = c.charging_process_id
	LEFT JOIN addresses addr ON addr.id = cp.address_id
	LEFT JOIN geofences geo ON geo.id = geofence_id
	WHERE 
		c.fast_charger_present IS true
		AND c.charger_voltage = 2
		AND cp.car_id = $car_id
		AND (addr.name ILIKE '%supercharger%' OR geo.name ILIKE '%supercharger%')
	GROUP BY 1
)
SELECT
	sum(cp.cost) as total
FROM
	charging_processes cp, data
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(end_date)
  AND cp.cost IS NOT NULL
  AND cp.id IN (data.charging_process_id);

WITH data AS (
	SELECT c.charging_process_id 
	FROM charges c
	LEFT JOIN charging_processes cp ON cp.id = c.charging_process_id
	LEFT JOIN addresses addr ON addr.id = cp.address_id
	LEFT JOIN geofences geo ON geo.id = geofence_id
	WHERE 
		c.fast_charger_present IS true
		AND c.charger_voltage = 2
		AND cp.car_id = $car_id
		AND CASE 
			WHEN (cp.geofence_id IS NOT NULL) THEN (addr.name NOT ILIKE '%supercharger%' AND geo.name NOT ILIKE '%supercharger%')
			ELSE addr.name NOT ILIKE '%supercharger%'
		END
	GROUP BY 1
)
SELECT
	sum(cp.cost) as total
FROM
	charging_processes cp, data
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(end_date)
  AND cp.cost IS NOT NULL
  AND cp.id IN (data.charging_process_id);

WITH data AS (
	SELECT c.charging_process_id 
	FROM charges c
	LEFT JOIN charging_processes cp ON cp.id = c.charging_process_id
	WHERE 
		c.fast_charger_present IS NOT true
		AND c.charger_voltage != 2
		AND cp.car_id = $car_id
	GROUP BY 1
)
SELECT
	sum(cp.cost) as total
FROM
	charging_processes cp, data
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(end_date)
  AND cp.cost IS NOT NULL
  AND cp.id IN (data.charging_process_id);

SELECT
  inserted_at AS "time",
  efficiency
FROM cars
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(inserted_at)
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
	$total_charging_cost

SELECT 
	($total_charging_cost / round(((EXTRACT(epoch from age(updated_at, inserted_at)) / 86400)) / 30)) total_per_month
FROM cars
WHERE
	id = $car_id

SELECT 
	($total_charged / round(((EXTRACT(epoch from age(updated_at, inserted_at)) / 86400)) / 30)) total_per_month
FROM cars
WHERE
	id = $car_id

SELECT convert_km((max(odometer) - min(odometer))::numeric, '$length_unit') as "distance_$length_unit"
FROM positions
WHERE car_id = $car_id
ORDER BY 1;

SELECT
	count(*)
FROM
	charging_processes
WHERE
	charge_energy_added > 0.01
	AND car_id = $car_id;

SELECT
	$total_charged

SELECT
	sum(greatest(charge_energy_added,charge_energy_used))
FROM
	charging_processes
WHERE
	car_id = $car_id AND charge_energy_added > 0.01
	AND cost = 0;

WITH data AS (
  SELECT
		cp.id,
		cp.charge_energy_added,
		CASE WHEN NULLIF(mode() within group (order by charger_phases),0) is null THEN 'DC'
				 ELSE 'AC'
		END AS current,
		cp.charge_energy_used
	FROM charging_processes cp
  RIGHT JOIN charges ON cp.id = charges.charging_process_id
  WHERE
	  cp.car_id = $car_id
	  AND cp.charge_energy_added > 0.01
  GROUP BY 1,2
)
SELECT
	now() AS time,
	sum(greatest(charge_energy_added, charge_energy_used)) AS value,
	current AS metric
FROM data
GROUP BY 3
ORDER BY metric DESC;

SELECT (
  SELECT sum(cost)
  FROM charging_processes
  WHERE car_id = $car_id
) / (
	SELECT convert_km((max(odometer) - min(odometer))::numeric, '$length_unit')
	FROM positions
	WHERE car_id = $car_id
) * 100

SELECT (
  SELECT sum(cost)
  FROM charging_processes
  WHERE car_id = $car_id
) / (
  SELECT sum(greatest(charge_energy_added, charge_energy_used))
  FROM charging_processes
  WHERE car_id = $car_id
)

WITH data AS (
	SELECT c.charging_process_id 
	FROM charges c
	LEFT JOIN charging_processes cp ON cp.id = c.charging_process_id
	LEFT JOIN addresses addr ON addr.id = cp.address_id
	LEFT JOIN geofences geo ON geo.id = geofence_id
	WHERE 
		c.fast_charger_present IS true
		AND c.charger_voltage = 2
		AND cp.car_id = $car_id
		AND (addr.name ILIKE '%supercharger%' OR geo.name ILIKE '%supercharger%')
	GROUP BY 1
)
SELECT
	sum(cp.cost) as total
FROM
	charging_processes cp, data
WHERE
  cp.cost IS NOT NULL
  AND cp.id IN (data.charging_process_id);

WITH data AS (
	SELECT c.charging_process_id 
	FROM charges c
	LEFT JOIN charging_processes cp ON cp.id = c.charging_process_id
	LEFT JOIN addresses addr ON addr.id = cp.address_id
	LEFT JOIN geofences geo ON geo.id = geofence_id
	WHERE 
		c.fast_charger_present IS true
		AND c.charger_voltage = 2
		AND cp.car_id = $car_id
		AND CASE 
			WHEN (cp.geofence_id IS NOT NULL) THEN (addr.name NOT ILIKE '%supercharger%' AND geo.name NOT ILIKE '%supercharger%')
			ELSE addr.name NOT ILIKE '%supercharger%'
		END
	GROUP BY 1
)
SELECT
	sum(cp.cost) as total
FROM
	charging_processes cp, data
WHERE
  cp.cost IS NOT NULL
  AND cp.id IN (data.charging_process_id);

WITH data AS (
	SELECT c.charging_process_id 
	FROM charges c
	LEFT JOIN charging_processes cp ON cp.id = c.charging_process_id
	WHERE 
		c.fast_charger_present IS NOT true
		AND c.charger_voltage != 2
		AND cp.car_id = $car_id
	GROUP BY 1
)
SELECT
	sum(cp.cost) as total
FROM
	charging_processes cp, data
WHERE
  cp.cost IS NOT NULL
  AND cp.id IN (data.charging_process_id);

WITH data AS (
SELECT
  duration_min > 1 AND
  distance > 1 AND
  ( 
    start_position.usable_battery_level IS NULL OR
    (end_position.battery_level - end_position.usable_battery_level) = 0 
  ) AS is_sufficiently_precise,
  NULLIF(GREATEST(start_ideal_range_km - end_ideal_range_km, 0), 0) AS range_diff,
  date_trunc('month', (start_date::TIMESTAMP WITHOUT TIME ZONE) AT TIME ZONE '$timezone') as local_period,
  drives.*
FROM drives
  LEFT JOIN positions start_position ON start_position_id = start_position.id
  LEFT JOIN positions end_position ON end_position_id = end_position.id)
SELECT
  EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM date_trunc('month', local_period))*1000 AS date_from,
  EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM date_trunc('month', local_period + ('1 ' || 'month')::INTERVAL))*1000 AS date_to,
  CASE 'month'
    WHEN 'month' THEN to_char(local_period, 'YYYY Month')
    WHEN 'year' THEN to_char(local_period, 'YYYY')
    WHEN 'week' THEN 'week ' || to_char(local_period, 'WW') || ' starting ' || to_char(local_period, 'YYYY-MM-DD')
    ELSE to_char(local_period, 'YYYY-MM-DD')
  END AS display,
  local_period AS date,
  convert_km(max(end_km)::integer - min(start_km)::integer, '$length_unit') AS sum_distance_$length_unit,
  convert_celsius(avg(outside_temp_avg), '$temp_unit') AS avg_outside_temp_$temp_unit,
  sum(distance)/sum(range_diff) AS efficiency
FROM data WHERE
  car_id = $car_id
GROUP BY date
ORDER BY date

WITH data AS (
  SELECT
    charging_processes.*,
    date_trunc('month', (start_date::TIMESTAMP WITHOUT TIME ZONE) AT TIME ZONE '$timezone') as local_period
    FROM charging_processes)
SELECT
  EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM date_trunc('month', local_period))*1000 AS date_from,
  EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM date_trunc('month', local_period + ('1 ' || 'month')::INTERVAL))*1000 AS date_to,
  CASE 'month'
    WHEN 'month' THEN to_char(local_period, 'YYYY Month')
    WHEN 'year' THEN to_char(local_period, 'YYYY')
    WHEN 'week' THEN 'week ' || to_char(local_period, 'WW') || ' starting ' || to_char(local_period, 'YYYY-MM-DD')
    ELSE to_char(local_period, 'YYYY-MM-DD')
  END AS display,
  local_period AS date,
  sum(greatest(charge_energy_added,charge_energy_used)) AS sum_consumption_kwh,
  sum(greatest(charge_energy_added,charge_energy_used)) / count(*) AS avg_consumption_kwh,
  sum(cost) AS cost_charges,
  count(*) AS cnt_charges
FROM data WHERE
  car_id = $car_id AND
  (charge_energy_added IS NULL OR charge_energy_added > 0.1)
GROUP BY date
ORDER BY date

WITH data AS (
  SELECT
    drives.*,
    date_trunc('month', (start_date::TIMESTAMP WITHOUT TIME ZONE) AT TIME ZONE '$timezone') as local_period
  FROM drives)
SELECT
  EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM date_trunc('month', local_period))*1000 AS date_from,
  EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM date_trunc('month', local_period + ('1 ' || 'month')::INTERVAL))*1000 AS date_to,
  CASE 'month'
    WHEN 'month' THEN to_char(local_period, 'YYYY Month')
    WHEN 'year' THEN to_char(local_period, 'YYYY')
    WHEN 'week' THEN 'week ' || to_char(local_period, 'WW') || ' starting ' || to_char(local_period, 'YYYY-MM-DD')
    ELSE to_char(local_period, 'YYYY-MM-DD')
  END AS display,
  local_period AS date,
  sum(GREATEST(start_[[preferred_range]]_range_km - end_[[preferred_range]]_range_km, 0) * car.efficiency * 1000) / 
  convert_km(sum(distance)::numeric, '$length_unit') as efficiency_net_$length_unit
FROM data
JOIN cars car ON car.id = car_id
WHERE
  car_id = $car_id
GROUP BY date
ORDER BY date

list.definition: SELECT name AS __text, id AS __value FROM cars ORDER BY display_priority ASC, name ASC;
list.label: Car
list.name: car_id
list.query: SELECT name AS __text, id AS __value FROM cars ORDER BY display_priority ASC, name ASC;

list.definition: select current_setting('TIMEZONE'), name from pg_timezone_names where abbrev ~ '^[a-zA-Z]{3,4}$' and name not like 'posix%' order by 2;
list.label: Time zone
list.name: timezone
list.query: select current_setting('TIMEZONE'), name from pg_timezone_names where abbrev ~ '^[a-zA-Z]{3,4}$' and name not like 'posix%' order by 2;

SELECT
	sum(cost)
FROM
	charging_processes
WHERE
	car_id = $car_id;
list.name: total_charging_cost
list.query:

	sum(cost)
FROM
	charging_processes
WHERE
	car_id = $car_id;

	sum(greatest(charge_energy_added,charge_energy_used))
FROM

	sum(greatest(charge_energy_added,charge_energy_used))
FROM
	charging_processes
WHERE
	car_id = $car_id AND charge_energy_added > 0.01;
